name: Grid Collapse
description:
Had to take down browser build for now (it was almost unplayable)

Unfortunately trying to add video files in instructions did not work on web export for some reason (worked on android and windows).
Tried to solve the problem by upgrading to newer versions of Godot but this caused the game's performance to get a lot worse for some reason(was running well on browser before that). However now i am unable to return the project to previous state.

Was unable to implement settings menu or compose any music due this issue taking all my time.

Will be fixing after voting period ends.
